name: no signal (itch) (Carrogath)
description:
Explore the ruins of Tokyo with a sword-wielding office lady! Fight monsters with the weaponized embodiment of your trauma! Grow uncomfortably close to a stranger through contrived circumstances! A JRPG-inspired yuri romance for the modern age.

Features two endings and about 15,000 words. Content warnings can be viewed when starting the game.
